flavourText: A colossal being woven from polysaccharides and peptide chains. Break its bonds to defeat it.
Rules the cell with an iron membrane. Each organelle obeys its command.
Controls what enters and exits. Nothing passes without its approval.
An ancient guardian of the active site, armed with knowledge of saturation.
Unwinds the double helix and rewrites the code. Decode its message to win.
Pulls chromosomes apart with spectral spindle fibres. Divide and conquer.
Moves silently across every surface. Thin, efficient, relentless.
Pumps with unstoppable force. Feel the pressure of every heartbeat.
Harvests energy from glucose with ruthless efficiency.
Absorbs light and converts it to power. Outshine it or be consumed.
Maintains perfect balance. Any deviation triggers its wrath.
Commands all trophic levels. Disrupt its food web to claim victory.
Evades every immune defence. Identify its antigens and mount a response before it overwhelms you.
